articles.author: Michelle Cheng
articles.title: Can the pandemic save WeWork?
articles.description: Covid-19 is forcing coworking spaces to cut costs, but the future might be bright.
articles.content: In an S-1 filing ahead of its ill-fated IPO attempt, WeWork included a recession among its risk factors.

articles.title: Khabib Nurmagomedov appears to go after Conor McGregor after UFC 257 on social media - Fox News
articles.description: Khabib Nurmagomedov appeared to have some choice words for Conor McGregor after the Irishman’s knockout loss to Dustin Poirier at UFC 257 on Saturday night.
